value.verse: For God alone my soul in silence waits; *

value.halfverse: my stronghold, so that I shall not be greatly shaken.
value.verse: He alone is my rock and my salvation, *

value.halfverse: as if you were a leaning fence, a toppling wall?
value.verse:
How long will you assail me to crush me,
all of you together, *
They seek only to bring me down from my place of honor; *

value.halfverse: but in their hearts they curse.
truly, my hope is in him.
value.verse: For God alone my soul in silence waits; *

value.halfverse: my stronghold, so that I shall not be shaken.
value.verse: He alone is my rock and my salvation, *
In God is my safety and my honor; *
value.halfverse: God is my strong rock and my refuge.
pour out your hearts before him, for God is our refuge.
value.verse: Put your trust in him always, O people, *
Those of high degree are but a fleeting breath, *
value.halfverse: even those of low estate cannot be trusted.

value.verse: On the scales they are lighter than a breath, *

value.halfverse: though wealth increase, set not your heart upon it.
value.verse:
Put no trust in extortion;
in robbery take no empty pride; *
God has spoken once, twice have I heard it, *

value.halfverse: for you repay everyone according to his deeds.
value.verse: Steadfast love is yours, O Lord, *
